MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.MatrixFactorizationExtensions.MatrixFactorization (ctx, label, matrixColumnIndex, matrixRowIndex, regularizationCoefficient, approximationRank, learningRate, numIterations, advancedSettings, onFit)

Docs.typeparam: The type of physical value of matrix's row and column index. It must be an integer type such as uint.
Docs.param: The column index of the considered matrix.
The row index of the considered matrix.
The frobenius norms of factor matrices.
Rank of the two factor matrices whose product is used to approximate the consdered matrix
A delegate to set more settings.

A delegate that is called every time the method is called on the instance created out of this. This delegate will receive the model that was trained. Note that this action cannot change the result in any way; it is only a way for the caller to be informed about what was learnt.
Docs.summary: Predict matrix entry using matrix factorization
